selected_creative.headline: VALUE / PRICE-ANCHORED
selected_creative.body: Scene: A comparison shopping scenario, where our persona is researching and comparing different headsets for their needs, focusing on value for money. Role: Offering premium features at an accessible price point.
selected_creative.visualDescription: A minimalist, well-lit room with several headsets on a table, the NeuralLink Pro prominently displayed with key features highlighted
selected_creative.rationale: Targeting The Modern Consumer via Smart decision-making and satisfaction angle.

raw_prompt.persona_usage_context: A comparison shopping scenario, where our persona is researching and comparing different headsets for their needs, focusing on value for money
raw_prompt.product_role: Offering premium features at an accessible price point
raw_prompt.visual_framing: A minimalist, well-lit room with several headsets on a table, the NeuralLink Pro prominently displayed with key features highlighted

llm_parameters.style_notes: Use clean lines, and bold typography to convey value and quality

raw_prompt.rationale: Highlighting the value proposition in a direct comparison setting can sway the persona's purchasing decision

reasoning.summary: Variant "VALUE / PRICE-ANCHORED" was selected as the winner with a weighted score of 91.9/100. It performed strongest in Brand Alignment. It outperformed the runner-up (Variant 4) by 3.7 points.
